医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
收入和教育与降低中风后死亡率有关今天在 2024 年第十届欧洲中风组织会议上公布的新研究显示，高收入人群中风后死亡的风险降低了 32%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Income-and-education-linked-to-lower-post-中风-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Income-and-education-linked-to-lower-post-中风-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8ff1459-4af6-48ec-930e-2e5bf7e125f3 Wed, 15 May 2024 08:25:15 -0400 Income and education linked to lower post-stroke mortality
研究揭示女性健康应用程序的隐私风险伦敦大学学院和伦敦国王学院的最新研究表明，专为女性健康监测而设计的应用程序因数据处理不当而使用户面临不必要的隐私和安全风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-reveals-privacy-risks-in-female-health-apps.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-reveals-privacy-risks-in-female-health-apps.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45111041-6148-460d-8727-9186450dad89 Wed, 15 May 2024 08:08:46 -0400 Study reveals privacy risks in female health apps
中晚年黑人携带者 TTR 基因变异的心血管负担与之前的分析相比，这项研究的主要贡献是提供了对中晚年心血管​​风险更准确的估计。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Cardioangio-burden-of-TTR-gene-variant-among-Black-riers-across-mid-to-late-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Cardioangio-burden-of-TTR-gene-variant-among-Black-riers-across-mid-to-late-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e03ea6b-2118-43cd-b9e7-a1cf75f63b7d Wed, 15 May 2024 07:56:00 -0400 Cardiovascular burden of TTR gene variant among Black carriers across mid to late-life
新研究表明睡眠和麻醉期间大脑毒素清除率降低脂肪神经轴在心律失常发生中起着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/New-study-reveals-brain-clearance-of-toxins-is-reduced-during-sleep-and-anesthesia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/New-study-reveals-brain-clearance-of-toxins-is-reduced-during-sleep-and-anesthesia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ee3cb92-f02f-4d2e-b65e-43822ffee90b Wed, 15 May 2024 07:25:00 -0400 New study reveals brain clearance of toxins is reduced during sleep and anesthesia

一名儿童死亡后，加州考虑制定极端天气期间的体育规则亚乎术阿·罗宾逊（Yahushua Robinson）是一个精力充沛的男孩，他在生活中跳跃着、跳舞着。随后，一名体育老师指示这位12岁的孩子在气温升至107度的一天出去跑步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/After-a-childe28099s-death-California-weighs-rules-for-phys-ed-during-extreme-weather.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/After-a-childe28099s-death-California-weighs-rules-for-phys-ed-during-extreme-weather.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c74c420-6cc5-4278-bfd6-20b696e44424 Wed, 15 May 2024 06:40:54 -0400 After a child’s death, California weighs rules for phys ed during extreme weather
